testsuite.name: ee.ut.math.tvt.salessystem.Tests

testcase.name: Checks that after canceling an order the quantities of the related StockItems are not changed
Should test if submitting a purchase makes a previousCart have accurate dates
Should show if adding an exiting item increases the stock quantity and if the saveStockItem method of the DAO is not called
Should test if submitting a purchase makes a previousCart item in history
Checks that canceling an order (with some items) and then submitting a new order (with some different items) only saves the items from the new order (with canceled items are discarded)
Should detect if submitting the purchase decreases StockItem quantity. Testing submitCurrentPurchase() method in class ShoppingCart.
Submitting current purchase starts and commits transaction once and in correct order.
Should show if a new item is saved through the DAO
